data.name: Placement Student
data.title: Industrial Placement Student
content: I have extensive experience in cloud database health monitoring, having utilized {{Grafana}} with {{Prometheus}} and {{Golang}} endpoints to create dashboards, and developed a {{DataDog}} wrapper API for business insights.

I also built internal tools using {{Amazon S3}} and {{Python}} for log parsing, provided technical support for {{Kubernetes}} and Couchbase-related database issues, and authored documentation for infrastructure setup using {{Docker}}, EC2, {{Terraform}}, and Kubernetes.

data.name: Production Operative
data.title: Full-stack TypeScript developer (React, React Native, Node.js, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, TypeORM, TailwindCSS)
content: I was responsible for quality assurance in a fast-paced, high-pressure production environment, ensuring products met customer expectations.
I developed strong {{time management}} skills and the ability to quickly {{adapt}} to unfamiliar situations.

data.name: Data Admin
data.title: Data Handling Support
content: I {{processed}} confidential {{medical data}} using NHS software like DocMan and EMIS, contributing to the NHS's digital enablement by digitizing records.
Additionally, I assisted patients at the front desk and collaborated with nurses and doctors to schedule appointments
